scripts.deploy: cdk deploy --profile appi --require-approval never && npm run invalidate
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && cp -r src dist && cleancss -o dist/style.css src/style.css && html-minifier-terser --input-dir dist --output-dir dist --file-ext html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-js --minify-css
scripts.update: npm run build && aws s3 sync dist s3://androidapptesters-com-static --delete --profile appi && npm run invalidate
